DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Collecting store sample tumor tissue ascites fluid patient test laboratory may help study cancer . PURPOSE : This pre-clinical research study collect tissue sample ascites fluid patient stage III stage IV ovarian/primary peritoneal/fallopian tube epithelial cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Collection Tissue Samples From Patients With Stage III Stage IV Ovarian Epithelial Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To generate translational ovarian cancer model use tumor tissue cell patient stage III-IV ovarian/primary peritoneal/fallopian tube epithelial cancer drug response development . OUTLINE : Tissue fluid sample collect time surgery paracentesis use laboratory experiment animal model . Health data collect patient medical record , , surgery . After surgery , patient follow 5 year .
